name: Burger Man
description: Burger Man is the product of a 100% American father's love for fun, family, and some good old-fashioned food! Based in Edgeville.

name: Fred's Froyo
description: Get your froyo (frozen yogurt) at Fred's, here we serve the best frozen treats in Edgeville! Been the best around since '89!

name: McWonald's
description: Burgers and chicken galore! Get your favorite snacks from McWonald's today! 20% off for children under 13 until the end of September.

name: Chum Casket
description: Welcome to the Chum Casket, the real place to get real CHUMmy with. Serving customers for over 15 years, we seek to give you a new experience (unlike the restaurant in front of us).

name: Nuka-Cola Cafeteria
description: Proudly serving the best burger and cola combination since 1856. If even a nuclear apocalypse can't stop us, then nothing will!

name: Shoney's Family Diner
description: Bring your kids, bring your friends, here at Shoney's Family Diner! We seek to provide a unique homely experience away from home.
